ns0:StringWithMarkup.ns0:String: LC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) age 29 days, mean length 17.6 mm, mean weight 0.056 g; Conditions: flow through, 25.1 째C, pH 7.38, hardness 44.8 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 49.4 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 7.0 mg/L; Concentration: 0.9 mg/L for 96 hr (95% confidence limit: 0.73-1.10 mg/L) /99+% purity/

EC50; Species: Pimephales promelas (Fathead minnow) age 29 days, mean length 17.6 mm, mean weight 0.056 g; Conditions: flow through, 25.1 째C, pH 7.38, hardness 44.8 mg/L CaCO3, alkalinity 49.4 mg/L CaCO3, dissolved oxygen 7.0 mg/L; Concentration: 0.73 mg/L for 96 hr (95% confidence limit: 0.73-1.10 mg/L); Effect: Affected fish lost schooling behavior, were hypoactive and underreactive to external stimuli, were darkly colored, and lost equilibrium prior to death. /99+% purity/
